name: Vibration Sequence File
summary: Learn about .VIBR files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: You can create and play VIBR files with various programs on desktop and mobile devices and on the web. For example, VibRat is a web application that allows you to create custom vibration sequences and download them as VIBR files.
After creating a VIBR file, you can open it with software that supports the format. When played, the device's vibrator motor plays back the custom sequence.

description: A VIBR file contains a vibration sequence that various apps can play back via the vibrator motor of a smartphone, smartwatch, or another device. It stores vibration data, including the duration and delay of vibrations in milliseconds. VIBR files also contain metadata about the file, such as the author, creation date, and format version.

instructions: You can open VIBR files with various applications, including xTactic Vibrator, a massaging app for Android devices.
Since VIBR files store data in plain text, you can also open and edit them with a text editor.

images.alt: Screenshot of a .vibr file in Microsoft Visual Studio Code 1.62
images.caption: VIBR file open in Microsoft Visual Studio Code 1.62
